Case# AudioUnitParameterUnit.midi2Controller

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOS

```
case midi2Controller
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitParameterUnit/midi2Controller#see-also)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitParameterUnit/midi2Controller#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case absoluteCents`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/absolutecents)An absolute unit of measure for the musical pitch of a note.[`case BPM`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/bpm)A whole-number unit of measure for musical tempo, representing beats per minute.[`case beats`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/beats)A time unit of measure in musical beats.[`case boolean`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/boolean)A Boolean-like unit of measure.[`case cents`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/cents)A logarithmic unit of measure for a musical interval between two notes.[`case customUnit`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/customunit)A custom unit of measure.[`case decibels`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/decibels)A logarithmic unit of measure representing the ratio between two audio levels.[`case degrees`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/degrees)An angular degree unit of measure.[`case equalPowerCrossfade`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/equalpowercrossfade)An audio power unit of measure.[`case generic`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/generic)A generic unit of measure.[`case hertz`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/hertz)A hertz unit of measure.[`case indexed`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/indexed)An indexed unit of measure.[`case linearGain`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/lineargain)A linear unit of measure representing the difference between two audio levels.[`case midiController`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/midicontroller)A whole-number unit of measure corresponding to standard MIDI control numbers.[`case midiNoteNumber`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiounitparameterunit/midinotenumber)A whole-number unit of measure corresponding to audio frequency.
